title: Oladipo's Out, Fertitta All-In On Rockets, Mid-Season Tournament
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim Bontemps and Tim MacMahon discuss Victor Oladipo’s season ending injury, an interesting quote from Tilman Fertitta on the state of the Rockets, Russell Westbrook’s stellar play, would a mid-season tournament work in the NBA and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: The Hoop Collective: Oladipo's Out, Fertitta All-In On Rockets, Mid-Season Tournament
